Class OAColorSplitButton

                          com.viaoa.jfc.OAColorSplitButton
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.ItemSelectable, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants
public class OAColorSplitButton
extends OASplitButton

SplitButton that includes a dropdown color chooser. The color chooser has a button to display a custom JColorChooser dialog.

Author:
vvia
See Also:
